info.title: API for React Task Pro application
info.description: REST API for managing users, boards, columns, tasks in React Task Pro application

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Users authorization endpoints. Register a new user using name, email, and password.

post.description: Create a new board and assign the current user as the owner.

get.summary: Get a board by its ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific board by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to retrieve.

patch.description: Update the details of an existing board.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to update

delete.description: Deletes a board along with its columns and tasks if the user is authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to delete

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or parameters)

403.description: Forbidden (user not authorized to delete the board)

example.message: You are not authorized to remove this board

get.summary: Get all columns for a board
get.description: Retrieve all columns associated with a specific board by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to retrieve columns for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved columns for the board

post.summary: Create a column for a board
post.description: Creates a new column for a specific board.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to add the column to

title.description: The title of the new column

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the column to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the column to delete

get.summary: Get all tasks for a board
get.description: Retrieve all tasks associated with the columns of a specific board.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to retrieve tasks from

200.description: List of all tasks for the specified board

post.summary: Create a task for a column
post.description: Creates a new task in the specified column.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the column to add the task to

requestBody.description: Task object that needs to be added to the column

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or parameters)

patch.description: Updates an existing task with new data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to update

title.description: The updated title of the task

description.description: The updated description of the task

priority.description: The updated priority level of the task

deadline.description: The updated deadline for the task

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or parameters)

delete.description: Deletes an existing task by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to delete

owner.description: Information about the owner of the board

id.description: The unique identifier of the column

board.description: The ID of the board that the column belongs to

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the column was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the column was last updated

id.description: The ID of the created task

priority.description: The priority level of the task

column.description: The ID of the column this task belongs to
